description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国山东省省会，副省级市，山东省的政治、经济、文化、科技、教育、交通和金融中心。
description.en: The capital of Shandong Province, People's Republic of China, a sub-provincial city, and the political, economic, cultural, scientific, technological, educational, transportation, and financial center of Shandong.

birth_place.zh-cn: 宁夏回族自治区海原县
birth_place.en: Haiyuan County, Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中共济南市委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, current CPC Secretary of Jinan.

nodes.id: 中国共产党济南市委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党济南市委员会
en: Jinan Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在济南市的领导机关。
description.en: The leading body of the Communist Party of China in Jinan.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任济南市市长。
description.en: Chinese politician, current Mayor of Jinan.

description.zh-cn: 济南市地方国家权力机关的执行机关和国家行政机关。
description.en: The executive organ of the local state power and the state administrative organ of Jinan City.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任济南市人民代表大会常务委员会主任。
description.en: Chinese politician, current Director of the Standing Committee of the Jinan Municipal People's Congress.

nodes.id: 济南市人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 济南市人民代表大会常务委员会
en: Standing Committee of the Jinan Municipal People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 济南市人民代表大会的常设机关。
description.en: The standing body of the Jinan Municipal People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中国人民政治协商会议济南市委员会主席。
description.en: Chinese politician, current Chairwoman of the Jinan Municipal Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议济南市委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议济南市委员会
en: Jinan Municipal Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议在济南的地方组织。
description.en: The local organization of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference in Jinan.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的省份，济南市是其省会。
description.en: A province of the People's Republic of China, of which Jinan is the capital.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年杰出的政治家、军事家、文学家、书法家，三国中曹魏政权的奠基人。
description.en: An outstanding statesman, strategist, writer, and calligrapher in the late Eastern Han dynasty, and the founder of the state of Cao Wei in the Three Kingdoms period.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代的郡，汉代设立，隋代改为齐州。
description.en: An ancient commandery in China, established during the Han dynasty and changed to Qizhou during the Sui dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 1928年国民革命军在北伐途中经过山东济南时，日本方面借口革命军对城内的日本侨民进行“抢劫”，而出动军队展开报复，蓄意屠杀中国军人与民众六千余人的事件。
description.en: In 1928, when the National Revolutionary Army passed through Jinan, Shandong during the Northern Expedition, Japan used the pretext that the revolutionary army had 'looted' Japanese civilians in the city to dispatch troops for retaliation, deliberately massacring over 6,000 Chinese soldiers and civilians.

description.zh-cn: 国民政府外交部特派山东交涉员，在五三惨案中被日军杀害。
description.en: A special commissioner of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Nationalist Government for negotiations in Shandong, who was killed by the Japanese army during the Jinan Incident.

description.zh-cn: 东亚国家。
description.en: A country in East Asia.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国主要的国家武装力量。
description.en: The principal military force of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 第二次国共内战时期，中国人民解放军华东野战军与中华民国国军在山东省济南市附近地区进行的一场战役。
description.en: A campaign during the second Chinese Civil War fought between the East China Field Army of the People's Liberation Army and the Republic of China Army in the vicinity of Jinan, Shandong Province.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院
en: State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高国家行政机关。
description.en: The chief administrative authority of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国山东省旧地级市，2019年1月9日撤销，其所辖区域划归济南市管辖。
description.en: A former prefecture-level city in Shandong Province, People's Republic of China, which was abolished on January 9, 2019, with its jurisdiction transferred to Jinan.

description.zh-cn: 中国新石器时代晚期的一种文化，因首次发现于济南市章丘区龙山街道的城子崖遗址而得名。
description.en: A late Neolithic culture in China, named after its first discovery at the Chengziya site in Longshan Sub-district, Zhangqiu District, Jinan.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代的一条重要河流，济南因地处其南而得名。
description.en: An important ancient river in China, from which Jinan derives its name for being located to its south.

description.zh-cn: 连接中国山东省青岛和济南的铁路，其建成促进了济南的繁荣。
description.en: A railway connecting Qingdao and Jinan in Shandong Province, China, the construction of which promoted the prosperity of Jinan.

description.zh-cn: 连接中国天津与南京浦口的铁路，与胶济铁路在济南交汇，促进了济南的繁荣。
description.en: A railway connecting Tianjin and Pukou, Nanjing in China, which intersects with the Jiaoji Railway in Jinan, promoting the city's prosperity.

description.zh-cn: 东南亚国家。
description.en: A country in Southeast Asia.

relationships.target: 中国共产党济南市委员会

description.zh-cn: 刘强担任中国共产党济南市委员会书记。
description.en: Liu Qiang serves as the Secretary of the Jinan Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 于海田担任济南市人民政府市长。
description.en: Yu Haitian serves as the Mayor of the Jinan Municipal People's Government.

relationships.target: 济南市人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 韩金峰担任济南市人民代表大会常务委员会主任。
description.en: Han Jinfeng serves as the Director of the Standing Committee of the Jinan Municipal People's Congress.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议济南市委员会

description.zh-cn: 雷杰担任中国人民政治协商会议济南市委员会主席。
description.en: Lei Jie serves as the Chairwoman of the Jinan Municipal Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 济南市是山东省的省会和下辖的地级市。
description.en: Jinan is the capital and a prefecture-level city under the jurisdiction of Shandong Province.

description.zh-cn: 东汉汉灵帝时期，曹操曾担任济南相。
description.en: During the reign of Emperor Ling of the Eastern Han Dynasty, Cao Cao served as the Chancellor of Jinan.

description.zh-cn: 日本借口北伐军“抢劫”日本侨民，出兵济南，蓄意屠杀中国军民，引发五三惨案。
description.en: Japan used the pretext of the Northern Expeditionary Army 'looting' Japanese civilians to dispatch troops to Jinan, deliberately massacring Chinese soldiers and civilians, which triggered the Jinan Incident.

description.zh-cn: 在五三惨案中，国民政府外交部特派山东交涉员蔡公时及署内职员17人被日军虐杀。
description.en: During the Jinan Incident, Cai Gongshi, a special commissioner of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Nationalist Government, and 17 staff members were brutally killed by the Japanese army.

description.zh-cn: 在五三惨案中，超过6000名济南市民被日军杀害。
description.en: During the Jinan Incident, over 6,000 citizens of Jinan were killed by the Japanese army.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军发动济南战役并占领济南。
description.en: The People's Liberation Army launched the Jinan Campaign and occupied Jinan.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 国务院批准撤销地级莱芜市。
description.en: The State Council approved the abolition of the prefecture-level city of Laiwu.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 国务院批准将原莱芜市所辖区域划归济南市管辖，扩大了济南市的行政区域。
description.en: The State Council approved the transfer of the former Laiwu City's jurisdiction to Jinan, expanding Jinan's administrative area.

description.zh-cn: 济南市是龙山文化的发现地，该文化于1928年在今济南市章丘区龙山街道的城子崖遗址首次被发现。
description.en: Jinan is the discovery site of the Longshan culture, which was first discovered in 1928 at the Chengziya site in today's Longshan Subdistrict, Zhangqiu District, Jinan.

description.zh-cn: 济南之名来源于其地理位置位于济水之南。
description.en: The name 'Jinan' originates from its geographical location south of the Ji River.

description.zh-cn: 胶济铁路的开通促进了济南的工商业发展和城市繁荣。
description.en: The opening of the Jiaoji Railway promoted the industrial and commercial development and urban prosperity of Jinan.

description.zh-cn: 津浦铁路与胶济铁路在济南交汇，使济南成为重要的铁路枢纽，促进了其繁荣。
description.en: The Jinpu Railway intersected with the Jiaoji Railway in Jinan, making the city an important railway hub and promoting its prosperity.

description.zh-cn: 柬埔寨决定在济南市设立总领事馆，这是中华人民共和国成立以来外国在济南设立的首个总领事馆。
description.en: Cambodia decided to establish a Consulate General in Jinan, the first foreign consulate general established in the city since the founding of the People's Republic of China.
